close.description: Shuts off the program, or a specific program

list.usage: vision list <list> (Currently only supports the list <commands>)

login.description: Prompts login to a specific app

open.description: Allows a user to open an app in the programs directory on the C drive

play.description: Plays a song either by the artist or song name

text.description: Allows the user to turn text mode on or off
